# frame

**Instance Property**

The frame, in global coordinates, used to display the Media Library Browser panel.

## Declaration

```swift
var frame: NSRect { get set }
```

## Displaying the Media Library Browser Panel

- **togglePanel(_:)**: Toggles the visibility of the Media Library Browser.
- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that determines whether the Media Library Browser panel is visible.
